we are living in 523 years of struggle and resistance.
during this time, we are living in 5 different moments.
The first moment we lived in the time of the Malok.
The first era was the time of the Malok and is the time of isolation.
The second moment was the time of the career.
The second era was the time of the run, running around.
Which was the time of war between one people and another people.
the third was the time of the Kachiveiro Jail.
when the Lords would come and grab our people.
the next era was the time of the rights.
when our land began to be demarcated.
And we began to organize ourselves politically.
Currently we are living in a different time.
